/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings, mostly in shades of beige and brown, are punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green, adding vibrancy to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the background. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the textures and colors of the scene.
